value.0:
DESCRIPTION:
moonstones have a waxy surface and tend to reflect little light. Some variants of a blue sheen exist but most are pale yellow or offwhite
LORE:
Old legends say that the sight of a moonstone would cause a lycanthrope to revent to his animal form. devices which affect lycanthropes therefore often use moonstones in their construction and/or decoration. Moonstones are also used a material components for spell casting. 
Another common saying is that it aids love and bonding and often is part of weddingdecorations
